name: Chicken and Shrimp Carbonara
description: Marinade: olive oil - chicken; Sauce: butter - salt; Cheese Topping: Romano - parsley
recipeIngredient: 3 lbs (or 2) chicken strips (or pre-cooked large shrimp)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk extra virgin olive oil together with hot water, seasoning, and chopped garlic. Add the meat, cover, and let marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Cook Bacon until crispy, break apart into bits.
Combine cheese mixture in a mixing bowl. Stir until well-blended.

Melt Butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and bacon. Saut√© for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.  Add remaining sauce ingredients and bring to a boil.  Reduce heat and allow to simmer.
Cook pasta. Strain and stir with oil to prevent noodles from sticking.
Simultaneously, preheat large skillet. Cook meat until both sides are cooked. Add chopped red peppers and remaining bacon. Cook until meat is hot (165F for chicken and 155F for shrimp).
Add meat to sauce. Stir until well-blended. Place pasta in casserole dishes, leaving room for sauce and topping.
Add sauce on top of noodles in casserole dishes. Use fork to evenly spread the sauce in between the noodles. Top evenly with cheese topping mixture. Cook in oven for 15 minutes, until golden brown.
